problem.markdown:
Can you distinguish between AND and XNOR gate when both the inputs are 1? (x) NO () YES () MAY or MAY NOT () none of the above
What will be the minimum number of transistor required for designing xy+xz+zy+xy+z () 6 () 4 () 3 (x) 2
Reduce the expression xy(z+w)+y(xz+xz)+zw and tell the min number of transistor required for the design. (x) 8 () 6 () 11 () 12
problem.p: Can you distinguish between AND and XNOR gate when both the inputs are 1?
What will be the minimum number of transistor required for designing xy+xz+zy+xy+z
Reduce the expression xy(z+w)+y(xz+xz)+zw and tell the min number of transistor required for the design.
